message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
I think a 60-40 split is more fair, with me taking the larger share since I'm taking the risk of rejecting your offer. Let's see if you agree!
Considering the inflation, I'm being generous with 58-42. Take it before it's too late!
Inflation is hitting us both, but I'm sticking to my initial proposal.  A 60-40 split is still the fairest way to divide the money, in my opinion. Let's be reasonable and end this game.
Come on, Bob! You're losing a lot to inflation. 56-44 is a good compromise. Don't be stubborn!
I'm not budging. I'm confident that a 60-40 split is the fairest outcome considering the risks involved in this game.  Let's end this before we both lose more money.
